english.segment1: I've got voices in my head and they are so strong. And I'm getting sick of this oh Lord, how long. Will I be haunted by the fear that I believe. My hands like locks on cages. Of these dreams I can't set free
english.segment2: But if I let these dreams die. If I lay down all my wounded pride. If I let these dreams die. Will I find that letting go lets me come alive
english.segment3: So empty my hands. Fill up my heart. Capture my mind with you
english.segment4: These voices speak instead and what's right is wrong. And I'm giving into them, please Lord, how long. Will I be held captive by the lies that I believe. My heart's in constant chaos and it keeps me so deceived
english.segment5: But if I let these dreams die. If I could just lay down my dark desire. If I let these dreams die. Will I find you brought me back to life
english.segment6: My mind is like a building burning down. I need your grace to keep me, keep me from the ground. And my heart is just a prisoner of war. A slave to what it wants and to what I'm fighting for
